about_the_game:
Inspired by characters from the Fantasy Heroine Character Pack series comes Fantasy Character Super Deformed Pack, full of characters who are super cute and super fun! Grab this pack and let your game's characters stand out...literally head and shoulders above the rest!

FEATURES:

* 39 Super Deformed characters: Total of 363 graphics!
* Each character comes with 3 looks: normal outlined / thicker outlined / shadow
* Each character comes with 3 sizes: 353x500 / 706x1000 / 2893x4092 pixels
* Many of the characters are from Fantasy Heroine Character Packs series, such as Samurai girl, Princess Knight and more!
* Some characters come with extra variations such as with facial scars or without hair accessory
* This pack is for use in RPG Makers, Visual Novel games or the engine of your choice. However, you may not sell your created game if it’s made with game development software other than the RPG Maker franchise or Visual Novel Maker.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
